tool_description: An API for results, calendar and live score for soccer.
name: SportWatch Soccer
title: SportWatch Soccer

api_list.name: All calendar
api_list.description: With this request you get all of future match of this season.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com/getAllCalendar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com/getAllCalendar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Results Of the Season by Competition
api_list.description:
Whit this endpoint you can get the results of one competition you want.

The code for each ligue is :

cl : Champions League
pl : Premier League
pe1 : La Liga
sai : Serie A
bund1 : Bundesligua
fl1 : Ligue 1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com/getResults/cl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com/getResults/{comp}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All matchs in live
api_list.description: This endpoint return all match in live of Champions League, Liga etc..
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All Results of Season
api_list.description: This request give you the results of all match of the current season in Champions League, Premier League, Liga, Bundesligua, Serie A and Ligue 1.

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Live By competiton
api_list.description:
This endpoint give you the list of matchs in live for selected competition

The code for each ligue is :

cl : Champions League
pl : Premier League
pe1 : La Liga
sai : Serie A
bund1 : Bundesligua
fl1 : Ligue 1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com/getLiveByComp/sai"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

api_list.name: Calendar By Competition
api_list.description:
You can get the calendar of the selected competition

The code for each ligue is :

cl : Champions League
pl : Premier League
pe1 : La Liga
sai : Serie A
bund1 : Bundesligua
fl1 : Ligue 1
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

api_list.name: Live Stats
api_list.description:
This endpoint is useful to get statistics about a match

The matchId can be found in any request as list of Live Match or in Calendar

The code for each ligue is :

cl : Champions League
pl : Premier League
pe1 : La Liga
sai : Serie A
bund1 : Bundesligua
fl1 : Ligue 1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com/getLiveStats/pe1/400074220"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com/getLiveStats/{comp}/{matchid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportwatch-soccer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
